评论概述: Beautiful dress, but not for large busts
评论详情: I got this dress to wear as a guest to a spring, floral wedding. First off, the pattern is even more beautiful in person, and the quality is surprisingly good. I reaaaally wanted it to work! Unfortunately, the bust is sewn in a way that is not flattering for large busts. For reference, I’m a 32F bra size, and got a small. I will try a larger size to see if that helps the fit. I love the feel of the material, although it doesn’t stretch. It’s definitely worth the price. I love the flow of it, and it would be perfect for the occasion, or just to wear out and about.
I got this dress for a beach engagement shoot. It was perfect.

I am so glad I bought this dress!  Belle Poque is one of my favorite clothing brands and I own a variety of their garments from blouses to skirts, belts, cardigans, and all different types of dresses.  When I saw the great price on this one ($16.99) and the beautiful colors and pattern, I HAD to get it. After the promotions offered and a discount I had, I spent $9.20 on this dress and its worth every single penny. Its worth the $16.99 and more, honestly.  There were no weird smells when I opened the package and the garment itself doesnt have any negative odors.  The material is so soft and light and flowy and its COMFORTABLE.  I can see myself wearing this with a cardigan in cooler weather and I think it will be perfect as-is in warm weather too.  The style of this dress is very complimentary for my figure. Its cut in a way that hides my loose abdominal and stomach skin, which I LOVE.  It hits me at a nice place on my calf (below knee) that doesnt make my legs look bigger than they are. (hard for me to find!)  There is a nice stretchy smocked area between the shoulder blades in back that helps lend a bit of give to the garment. This helps when putting it on and taking it off. (relieves stress on the garment)  This company sells true to size, American sized clothes and this dress is no different.  I haven't washed it yet bc it just arrived today but I will be washing it on cold delicate cycle in a delicates bag and then hang to air dry, followed by a light ironing. I believe that will help extend the life of the dress, but it seems to be very well made. A quality garment from the seams to the stitches and everything in between.  Nothing hangs wrong or looks funky on this dress. Nothing bulges weird.  My ONLY issue with this dress is the two vertical ruffles in front. I wish the company had chosen to use material with print on both sides, instead of using material that only had the pattern printed on one side.  If the ruffles werent the way they are, Id have given this dress an easy 5 stars. Because of them cutting corners with single sided ruffle print, I docked a star.  I cant wait til I have a place to wear this lovely dress!  FYI: I am 5ft3, 36D, 157 pounds and shortwaisted with 28 inch inseam.
The fabric is cheap and plastic feeling. The straps are also uncomfortable. This is a good one time use dress. I don’t think it’ll hold up over time.
This dress was a nice, soft material. Very comfortable and flattering. It snatches your torso so it creates a slimming look.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: I thought the dress was beautiful! Normally I alter peices I buy, but the fit was perfect right out of the box! The material didn't feel cheap to me at all, not super stretchy but not stiff either a good in-between. It is quite thin, but the under layer helps with that. The flow was exactly what I wanted a bit of a twirl always feels nice!

I was nervous at first on how this would looked on me personally. Let me tell you. I was soo kute in this. It’s like elegant but risqué at the same time. Most definitely something I haven’t seen in store before.
Not fit right

评论概述: Gorgeous dress.. Not for big breats 😔
评论详情: What a beautiful beautiful dress. I love everything about it. The thickness, the feel, how soft it is, the flowing of the dress, the pattern, design, just everything about this dress I love. EXCEPT the very sad fact it does not fit my breats. It's so hard to find a dress that is this nice, that actually fits my chest. The way this dress is made it has the outline for your breats, so if your breats do not fit in it, the dress does not fit you. There is hardly any give or stretch to the dress as well, so Im basically out of luck. I wish they could make a dress just like this, but big chest friendly.
The ruffles only have a pattern on one side, so when they drape down it’s really ugly
Very rhin material
This dress is beautiful in person. It’s a nice material that does not wrinkle easily. I was surprised how nice it is! Has adjustable straps. Love
The material feels great and the print is pretty. It's very flattering.

I ordered several dresses from Amazon and this one by far was the best! The quality of the material was really good. It also fit true to size and was very flattering. Thankful I found this dress at short notice for an event and I will be wearing again because I loved it so much.

评论概述: Cute but the zipper broke right away
评论详情: I was so excited to use this dress but the zipper broke almost instantly after putting it on. The event I was going to was going to be far and I didn’t feel comfortable wearing this dress after all. I am a size XL in shirts size 16 in jeans 38C for reference purchased a size XL.
So cute and comfy! Size is accurate
Does not look good when wear

Really well made sewing wise but the cut was strange. The check area for boobs was incredibly small and in a weird spot to where it made it impossible for me to wear the dress. Gorgeous and really wish it had worked out. The cut could easily be fixed with a small pattern readjustment or if the chest cups had matched the size of chest for that dress

I absolutely LOVEEE this dress! The material is so soft and the waist looks small but its super stretchy so it’s really flattering on you. The zipper is actually on the side, I honestly love that because it makes it a lot easier to take on and off, it’s also more discrete. The ruffles along the dress look amazing, they blend so well! Amazing quality overall, the dress is very comfortable. I will say though it didn’t come with pockets which I thought it said somewhere in the description it would, but the dress is still great. Another thing is I’m a 36DD so the chest underlining was a bit off, but not super noticeable so I don’t mind it. Material thickness is perfect in my opinion, perfectly thick so that it’s not see-through at all but not TOO thick that it makes you sweat just standing in it. Worth buying!
Fits so well! I like the ruffle detail in the front. Great for curvy ladies!

I got this dress to wear to a garden party wedding and it was the perfect choice. The green is a beautiful sage color that I feel like would compliment any skin tone. The ruffles are so fun and not too much that it's awkward. I wish there was a bit more support in the chest area, but the straps are adjustable which is a bit plus on these kinds of dresses. It was an outdoor wedding in August so it was a bit warm out but this dress was relatively breathable so I was never uncomfortable in it. Definitely recommend for a nice date night, a walk on the town, or a summer wedding.

Definitely buying the other colors I wanted knowing that this one fits perfectly. Note tho, if have small breasts (I'm B) you definitely need a push up bra for this because it makes me look kinda flat cheated without one but overall adorable. Super comfortable and lightweight. Do like how can go strapless of want by tucking in the straps and using the silicone ring around the top trim to hold up the dress. Without the silicone ring I don't think it would stay up but definitely love this dress.
The quality of this dress is Very good. Very feminine! Super comfortable Bought for vacation
I wanted to love the dress but it doesn’t work for women with larger chest (36 DDD). If they remove the outline on that part dress would be great as the fabric is not to thin and otherwise fit great.
Love the fit and material.  I have ordered the black as well.

评论概述: A perfect blend of style and comfort!
评论详情: This boho midi dress is ideal for casual outings or as a wedding guest outfit. The spaghetti straps and ruffle detailing add a playful yet elegant touch, making it a versatile piece for various occasions. The fit is flattering, even though I did need to size up to accommodate my larger bust size. The lightweight fabric is perfect for warm weather. I love how effortlessly chic it looks. Overall, this dress is a fantastic addition to any summer wardrobe!

I bought this for my Engagement photos & it was perfect. I felt so comfortable in it. I also got a lot of compliments! Straps are adjustable and the girls felt secured! Dress was perfect! I ordered an XL i believe… i added a photo for reference because i know it helps me when ordering so i hope it helps you too.
Nice dress and fit me for size I ordered
While this dress is gorgeous, I think it may run small. I ordered by usual size (L) but the top was too tight. I had to return.
such a beautiful dress and good quality

The ruffle looks stupid because it is white on the back side, which cheapens the look. Since the ruffle hangs, you can see the white side of it. Don't like at all. It fits comfortable and flows as it should, which was great. I am 5'5 & 127lbs and ordered a Large.
The inner lining is so comfortable. For me, the fit is perfect. I wear a 38 DD bra and there is room in the bodice.

I went with Amazons recommendation for an XXL. The dress itself is a little big, the bust is snug.  But not so bad I would have to send back.  I also wouldn’t  be able to size down for this reason. I love how it looks on me. It will wrinkle which is the biggest drawback. As I am taking this dress on a cruise. Otherwise, beautiful dress.
The ruffles on the skirt are single layer so one side is blank without the prints. Looks weird - like the tentacles on a squid.
Came with a stain right on the front of it and can't get another one before the wedding I am in.

Love this dress.  I don’t care what the directions say.  I washed in the machine, ran through dryer and hung. Zero shrinking.  Easy care.  Need one round of ironing after delivery and that’s it.  Super cute and lightweight for hot weather.  Very pretty dress
I was shocked at how nice this dress is, really similar quality to Aritzia or Reformation dresses.
The dress fit beautifully. I'm 5ft 170lbs at it was a great fit.

I had to return this dress because even though the dress fit, the outline of the breast was very badly made. There is thread to outline the breast, but the outline is far apart and very high up, so your breast will always fall below the outline. It looks very unflattering. This is a size large

Beautiful dress, but smells very, very, very strongly of chemicals. My husband has trouble with being able to smell things and he could smell it. It is horrid. I hope we can get this smell removed or it will be useless.
Dress fits amazing. I ordered another color for my daughter’s wedding! I have a D size chest and is very comfortable!

This dress is beautiful! Love the white with blue flowers. Fits me perfectly. Except it is too low in the neckline for my liking. The straps are adjustable and thought I could help the neckline, but then the  bust doesnt fit correctly., the only reason I didn’t is give 5 stars for fit. So sad I must send back. Sure wish I could find something similar with this same fabric.

Loved the material of this dress. It’s feels great, has an under slip and it was thick enough where I didn’t need to wear a bra or feel self conscious. I am 5’2”, 205lbs and the XL fit great. Hugged my curves but still room for a flowy look.

Loved the style, the material and everything about this dress.  It was just difficult getting the top to fit correctly.. tried with a bra on and off and straps tight and loose.  Just couldn’t get it to fit correctly.
Beautiful dress and well made ! Comfortable ! Very happy with this dress
It was a perfect fit and true to size.
Fit to size. Quality fabric, comfortable. Beautiful pattern. Got so many compliments.
The spaghetti straps are great to show off your tan or add a cardigan for a different look. The flowy fabric is soft and comfortable but not see through. It fit great.
I normally wear a size 10/12 depending on the item. The rating said the size 10 would fit, but it runs small, and I should have ordered a size 12.
This gown is gorgeous and is perfect for any type of occasion. From a wedding all the way to a Sunday brunch with friends. It flows beautifully. It fit perfectly.

评论概述: Wish it were a nicer fabric, but otherwise stunning
评论详情: Ah, polyester. It seems to be what most clothing is made of now days and I just can't get away from it. This dress is no exception. Thankfully, the dress is so flattering and beautiful that it's easy to overlook the cheap material it's made of. I got my usual Belle Poque size of XXL and it's a little snug on my size 18/20 body, but it the elastic stretch material on the back allows me to adjust and fit it. It also has adjustable straps which help immensely. Once I got everything all adjusted and situation, I was so happy with what I saw in the mirror!  The dress is very flattering on most every figure - the way it hangs (not clings) and flows is so beautiful, like a flower swaying in the wind. I was at first skeptical about the ruffles down the sides but once it's on, they offer a beautiful silhouette and movement that makes you look like a soft Spring breeze. It's a very graceful and classy dress while still being young, fresh and flirty.  I got the green color and it reminds me so much of Spring and summer. There is a light lining on the inside that prevents the dress from being see-through. Despite the polyester, this dress was thoughtfully crafted and it shows in how it wears. It's beautiful and i'm very happy with this dress.
Fits true to size, wish the ruffle fabric was two sided because it looks sloppy how the backside of the fabric is what is mostly showing. Fits true to size.
Smooth material for summer. Thick enough to not be sheer. Great spring outfit with cardigan or for summer picnics.

I love this dress! It's well made and so flowy. The green color is gorgeous. Unfortunately, it appears to not be quite true to size. I ordered my normal XXL and it's gaping and the armpits and the chest. This is the only time I've had this issue with this brand and I have a lot of their other tops and dresses. Recommend that you size down if you adore this dress, or order two sizes and return one if you really need it right away!

This dress is incredibly beautiful. I love the floral pattern and the lightweight fabric; it feels high quality. I also like the ruffles. However, I don't think this dress was made for childbearing women. The bust is too high, made for perky tits that have never breastfed. The fabric has no give or stretch in it, so I could barely zip it up around my postpartum belly and nursing breasts. There are adjustable straps, but they don't adjust long enough for me. I had to wear a strapless, push-up bra to get my boobs to fit right in the dress. Even then, it is not a perfect fit. I am 125 lbs, 5'4" and 2 months postpartum, and I ordered small. I wish I ordered medium. I hope this dress fits me better as I lose more baby weight and stop nursing. It is still flattering nevertheless.

评论概述: Very Flattering! Size down, semi thin fabric.
评论详情: This dress is extremely flattering and flowy! I would size down, and it has semi thin fabric so I would wear shape wear to mask any unwanted texture.

At first I thought it looked to much like a bridesmaid dress but it’s grown on me. It’s a perfect spring/summer dress. The length is just right for my height of 4’10. The green color is very pastel but very similar to picture. It hugs the waist just right and flows from the waist down. I honestly want this dress in every color they have.
Get a size down-it does not fit well (too big). I also don't like that the pattern is not on both sides of the ruffle. Overpriced for the quality. Cute but not cute enough.
Fit really well

Beautiful flowy dress. I'm 5'3" and it's not too long on me, about mid-calf. The pattern is beautiful and the fit is great; it fits true to size. The fabric is lightweight but not see-through. A great dressy summer dress!

This is a very pretty and flattering dress. I intend to wear it for Easter with a sweater. I ordered according to the size chart and it fits great other than being tight in the bust, tight enough that I won’t be able to wear a bra with it but I can just put some pads from a sports bra in the top and it will be fine. The material is silky and flowy so it’s comfortable.

The fabric on this alone is so good, it's a really soft, seemingly higher quality fabric and I didn't expect it to be as nice as it is. So that is a welcome surprise. Love that it's lined and overall it seems to be fairly well made. The blue and white is so good. The dress and fabric are giving reformation vibes for sure. I made the mistake of ordering a size medium, which I am, but I am a little larger chested, between a c and a d cup and the large would probably fit me a little better. I can squeeze everything into place but the bust is a little tight. The straps are adjustable and you have some give with the smocked elastic back. A great choice for easter, spring, summer, vacation, you name it! Enjoy.
I am going to enjoy showing myself off in this moderately showy dress this Summer. These lines are simple and sexy...sublime. Nice pick, I should say. Very comfortable.

评论概述: Not my favorite. House gown now
评论详情: I didn't like this dress. The top part is just off. Where your "girls" go is an awkward fit. If you wear a bra, it bags under your "girls" oddly. If you don't wear a bra, the "girls" are front and center. The dress also looks cheap. I will wear it around the house, so it's not a total loss, but I just really don't like it. It does fit true to size, and it's slightly see-through. The material is lightweight and thin.
Not sure how I feel about the vertical ruffles on this dress, but the dress itself is simply lovely. It's lightweight, so it will be great for warm weather. I also like the adjustable straps.

The perfect sundress does exist, and this is it!  I got this sundress for my oldest daughter who had planned a nice outing with her boyfriend and really wanted that demure sundress look. This dress looked perfect.  When she got it on, it was just breathtaking. I was a little iffy on how the side pieces would look in real life, but they absolutely belong on the dress. The pattern is stunning- it’s definitely got an older world feel to it. The cut of the bust is a little weird- I do suggest wearing a strapless that shapes you the way you want to be shaped, my daughter did this and it made all the difference in the world.  The material is so flowy and twirlable, and you’re not going to be able to resist spinning in it! It’s the perfect length. Paired with some navy heeled sandals and her pearls, this dress literally made her boyfriend of several years gasp- along with everyone else. It’s so delightfully lovely. I would love to have it in my size!  This dress is so beautiful and anyone lucky enough to see you in it will absolutely be glad they did. It’s just as comfortable to wear as the fabric is smooth and silky, and it’s just…. Perfect. Truly perfect.

I like this white dress with blue flowers. It's made of light fabric that feels nice to wear. The design is great. The straps can be adjusted and a shirred, stretchy back between the shoulders, gracefully accentuating curves without feeling constrictive. The side zipper operates smoothly, facilitating effortless dressing and undressing. Additionally, the ruffles cascading down the sides of the front skirt create a soft, elegant movement, while the fabric drapes exquisitely, enhancing the dress's flattering silhouette. The dress looks really nice on me, and it's become my favorite.

I absolutely adore my Belle Poque Sun Dress! It's the perfect addition to my wardrobe, offering both comfort and a flattering fit that makes me feel confident and stylish. The boho chic design, with its charming floral print and flowing silhouette, captures a sense of romanticism that's simply irresistible.  The dress features delightful ruffle details that add a playful and feminine touch, creating a sense of beautiful movement with every step I take. It's this level of detail that sets the dress apart and makes it a standout piece in my collection.  What I particularly appreciate is the flattering empire waist design. It not only enhances my figure but also ensures a comfortable fit, allowing me to move freely and enjoy my day without any constraints. The versatility of the dress's length adds an element of elegance and sophistication, making it suitable for a variety of occasions.

评论概述: Belle Poque Sun Dresses for Women 2
评论详情: This dress is beautiful and  it's so flowy . The material is very soft . I ordered my normal size small and I'm so sad that it fits a little loose in the top it's meant to fit snuggly but it runs a bit big. It does have adjustable straps and a zipper on the side as well as a ruched elastic back . The details on the dress are nice. Overall I'm happy with it and love it just a tad loose On me .

I love this dress! It looks and fits beautifully! It's my second dress from this seller and I must say that, although I am not a big fan of the fabrics, the designs are fabulous and the fit is always spot on. As I zipped this particular dress, it really felt like it was tailored just for me. It's absolutely perfect fit-wise and I am sure that the thin, but double layer fabric, and the elastic in the back will give many ladies this same feeling. For reference, I am 5'5, 130 lbs and got an S. In terms of the fabric, it does feel like polyester and not even the type that tries to imitate a cotton blend. However, it is very soft and it has zero static issues, which surprised me and it's definitely a plus. In fact, I believe that it's because of this fabric that the dress falls/flows so beautifully. I chose the white with blue flowers pattern because it makes the dress look a bit more casual and I'll get to wear it more often. Happy with my choice, as I'm really excited to wear this dress as soon as it gets warm! :) I definitely recommend it; I think the price is excellent for a dress that is as beautiful and flattering as this.

评论概述: Pretty, but fit is slightly off for me
评论详情: Very pretty summer dress, the Sage green color is soft and pretty, and the ruffles are well placed for a flattering fit.  The fit seems to be on point according to the size chart. I ordered an XL, and while it felt comfortable and not too tight in the chest, it didn't lay right on me.  I tried playing with the strap length, and that helped a little. But the pleats didn't lay properly under my chest. I am a 36DD, and 45 for reference. So maybe it's just made for a less endowed, younger wearer.

I gained a few (ehem...40) pounds during covid and nothing in my closet fits. I have a wedding to go to in June and this dress is perfect. I'm 5'5" and 186 lbs; I ordered XL and it fits quite well. I love the flower pattern, especially since the wedding is going to be held in a garden. The ruffles in front are pretty too. There is rouching in the back, which means it adjusts to your size and a side zipper to help with putting it on and taking it off. It's also - surprise! - fully lined, which I didn't expect to see in a dress at this price. All in all, I'm very pleased with this dress.

Cute dress! My girlfriend loved it. Very flattering without being too frilly. Classic pattern without looking too old school. Light and casual. Not my favorite material, but it seems well hemmed. Great at not really showing wrinkles!  Reasonable price at $40 but not an exceptional value imo. Overall, I’m (and she is) pretty happy!  4 stars.
Two words: buy it!! The ruffle design is super flattering, the color is great and fits perfectly on my girl. I can't wait to take her out in it!
I love the small flowers in soft summer colors. It has a zipper on the side and the ruffles down the sides of the front skirt  a gentle flow.

This dress is fabulous, the color, shape and material all make this dress so lovely, it's floaty, flattering and classy. It fits really well, the straps are adjustable, the back between the shoulders is shirred and stretchy, so it can be forgiving after a big meal or if the sizing is a bit off. It would make a fabulous wedding guest dress or Summer date night, it could be dressed down a bit but the style isn't very sutible to dress down for a casual look

评论概述: Loved it, just one sizing issue
评论详情: I absolutely love this dress and it is so elegant and the fabric is not cheap. However, I do have a complaint. I ordered size L because I usually have to because of my chest, but in this dress the top half was just WAY too small and tight. The rest of the dress flowed and felt amazing. The chest part, however, could use some adjusting.

My wife was surprised at how pretty this dress is on her. She is petite and got a small and it fits great. It looks just like the pictures. She likes that its fully lined so no need for a bra, and that there is an adjustable stretch in the chest so the bodice hugs her in a very flattering way. Its also adjustable and very well made, especially for the price.  She thinks its on par with what you might find at Forever 21 - it doesn't look 'expensive', but its very charming.  The only thing she wishes is that the ruffles were double-sided instead of being blank on one side, though she figures it was done that way to keep the fabric very light.

I am totally biased on this post. My wife looked astounding in this dress. We were a little concerned about the size but it ended up being a great fit, and might've been a little on the bigger side. My wife liked how comfortable it is and really liked the color. It fit her really nicely and I really liked seeing her in it.
